Note, just drop Sinesis and Sinister in the CR Chamber before they're dead!=
 Why would you need parts?...
  ----- Original Message ----- 
  From: ilove=
alllizards 
  To: nbwrpg@egroups.com 
  Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 5:12 AM=

  Subject: Re: Neo Beast Wars


  *Blizzard walks into the Pred base while=
 holding Sinesis. Twister follows* *Blizzard sits Sinesis down and sighs* B=
lizzard: I think were going to need anlot of parts. *Blizzard once again si=
ghs*
    ----- Original Message ----- 
    From: THECODE 
    To: nbwrpg@eg=
roups.com 
    Sent: Sunday, July 16, 2000 5:03 AM
    Subject: Neo Beast W=
ars


    Dracona walks up to the Predacon (Megatron's) base and looks at i=
t. It didn't notice her, so she went closer and inspected it. She looked ar=
ound it, making notes of certain things.

    Plintissa followed Artist out=
 in the missle of no where in a desert. Artist turned around and looked at =
Plintissa.

    "Plintissa now see Artist's secret treasure!" Artist said. =
He smiled. Plintissa was stunned. Artist dug a little in the sand, and brou=
ght up a hermit crab shell. Artist laughed and ran off laughing giddily. Pl=
intissa sighed and turned back. No wait, maybe this way was back. No wait, =
that way. Plintissa realized she was lost, and that Artist was nowhere to b=
e found. She looked around from left to right. Oh, what was the use, she mi=
ght as well be dead out on the desert anyhow, she obviously wasn't needed, =
not even Dracona stuck around with her! She had thought that Iron Raptor wa=
s her friend, but that blew up in her face. Then she made the mistake of tr=
usting some bot sho said he would help her, and then she went off and nobod=
y trusted her any longer. Plintissa walked off into the distance, hoping to=
 find her way home. Then it occured to her. She didn't have a home. a singl=
e tear fell from Plintissa's eye and she walked on.

    Artist ran off int=
o the distance and looked back joyfully. Plintissa wasn't there.

    "Yike=
s! I was supposed to protect her!" Artist said. He ran back into the desert=
, darting quickly mile for mile, trying to find Plintissa.

    Gangon's sp=
ark glowed eerily and bumped into BrightBlade's hand.

    Sinesis and Sini=
ster lay there, half dead with Sinister in pieces.

    Deemos figures out =
that this disgusting team must not be right for him and he runs off, hoping=
 maybe the Maximals would be good enough to let him and his wife join and h=
eal up. He ran along, going quickly, about 2 hours later he found the Maxim=
al base. Inzola was in his arms in stasis lock and spitting out blood, she =
was bleeding internally. Deemos whimpered and aproached the Maximal base.

=
    "Attention! Maximals! I wish to join you, as does my wife and cohort, I=
nzola! Let me it, Inzola is in critical condition!" Deemos said.

    The R=
adicons ceased their walk and sat down in a forest. Airbomber sighed.

    =
"Food would be good about now." Train Wreck said. Arrow smiled.

    "Wait =
here, I'll go get something!" Arrow said. He went running off. Blender and =
Stronghold shrugged, Stronghold staring into the distance and Blender scann=
ing the area. Stranato and Train Wreck look at each other and gulp. Arrow m=
ust be their chef now.

    "I hope you like what Arrow makes." Airbomber s=
aid to Infectra. (If she's there.)

---------------------------------------=
